name: FSkeletalMeshClothBuildParams
doc: Struct holding parameters needed when creating a new clothing asset or sub asset (LOD)

TargetLod: Target LOD to import to when importing LODs
bRemapParameters:
If reimporting, this will map the old LOD parameters to the new LOD mesh.
If adding a new LOD this will map the parameters from the preceeding LOD.
LodIndex: LOD to extract the section from
SourceSection: Section within the specified LOD to extract
bRemoveFromMesh: Whether or not to leave this section behind (if driving a mesh with itself). Enable this if driving a high poly mesh with a low poly
PhysicsAsset: Physics asset to extract collisions from, note this will only extract spheres and Sphyls, as that is what the simulation supports.
